医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生物标志物的发现为积极的乳腺癌治疗带来了希望瑞典隆德大学领导的一项新研究解决了一个多年来的谜团：哪些患有侵袭性乳腺癌的患者可以得到一种一直在开发但被搁置的靶向癌症治疗的帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Biomarker-discovery-offers-hope-for-aggressive-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Biomarker-discovery-offers-hope-for-aggressive-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4cfafdb-943f-4d05-a6d9-07f4ddded0e0 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 11:12:00 -0500 Biomarker discovery offers hope for aggressive breast cancer treatment
新颖的单细胞基因组学分析方法提供了对细胞周期和增殖的直接见解通过从单细胞基因组学推断增殖率，SPRINTER 增强了对肿瘤进化的理解并识别了癌症进展中的关键克隆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Novel-single-cell-genomics-analysis-approach-provides-direct-insights-into-cell-cycle-and-proliferation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Novel-single-cell-genomics-analysis-approach-provides-direct-insights-into-cell-cycle-and-proliferation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ced4eb58-ecbd-4b46-8696-de27a776cdf6 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 10:21:00 -0500 Novel single-cell genomics analysis approach provides direct insights into cell cycle and proliferation
心脏有一个控制节奏的迷你大脑卡罗林斯卡学院和哥伦比亚大学的新研究表明，心脏有一个迷你大脑——它自己的神经系统控制着心跳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/The-heart-has-a-mini-brain-that-c​​ontrols-its-rhythm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/The-heart-has-a-mini-brain-that-c​​ontrols-its-rhythm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b03084e1-0919-4f4d-9651-26c502ab6c87 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 10:19:00 -0500 The heart has a mini-brain that controls its rhythm
ACL 手术后步态改变会导致长期膝盖问题对于膝盖前十字韧带 (ACL) 受伤的人来说，手术 ACL 重建 (ACLR) 是恢复关节稳定性的有效治疗方法，然而，许多接受治疗的患者仍然会出现其他长期膝盖问题，例如膝骨关节炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Altered-gait-contributes-to-long-term-knee-problems-after-ACL-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Altered-gait-contributes-to-long-term-knee-problems-after-ACL-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8505bc6-2d5f-4fbf-9d2f-f5ec347e5ced Wed, 04 Dec 2024 10:12:52 -0500 Altered gait contributes to long-term knee problems after ACL surgery
创新方法预测癌症患者最有效的药物治疗一种新方法可以通过预测哪种药物最有效来改善慢性粒细胞白血病患者的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Innovative-approach-predicts-most- effective-medication-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Innovative-approach-predicts-most- effective-medication-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03e1f951-3bab-43e3-af7f-a777e37d980b Wed, 04 Dec 2024 10:06:10 -0500 Innovative approach predicts most effective medication for cancer patients
光纤传感系统可以彻底改变脑损伤的监测光纤是一种以极高的速度传输信息的手段。然而，该技术的用途不仅仅是提供快速的互联网连接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Optical-fibre-sensing-system-could-revolutionize-monitoring-of-brain-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Optical-fibre-sensing-system-could-revolutionize-monitoring-of-brain-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ddfa08f-bb3d-4f9d-b116-45de0bf5a6c7 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 09:55:11 -0500 Optical fiber sensing system could revolutionize monitoring of brain injuries
心脏药物可能会减缓亨廷顿病的进展研究表明，β-受体阻滞剂可以降低亨廷顿病运动诊断的风险并减缓亨廷顿病的症状进展，这提出了新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Heart-medication-may-slow-the-progression-of-Huntingtons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Heart-medication-may-slow-the-progression-of-Huntingtons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6c8b820-bcb1-4c02-ad6f-d4e994f099df Wed, 04 Dec 2024 09:42:00 -0500 Heart medication may slow the progression of Huntington's disease
新的人工智能工具绘制了数百万个 CD8+ T 细胞的图谱，以推进疾病研究scAtlasVAE 模型整合 scRNA-seq 数据来创建 CD8+ T 细胞图谱，增强对炎症和癌症免疫反应的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-AI-tool-maps-millions-of-CD82b-T-cells-to-advance-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-AI-tool-maps-millions-of-CD82b-T-cells-to-advance-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=898c4397-1f47-44dd-ae5a-4bb4efa5d04b Wed, 04 Dec 2024 09:07:00 -0500 New AI tool maps millions of CD8+ T cells to advance disease research
SRF 授予 230,000 美元拨款以推进 SYNGAP1 相关疾病的研究SynGAP 研究基金 (SRF) 向杰克逊实验室罕见疾病转化中心提供了 230,000 美元的资助，用于表征 SYNGAP1 相关疾病 (SRD) 的小鼠模型，SRD 是一种严重的神经发育障碍，以癫痫、智力障碍、运动和行为障碍为特征。挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/SRF-awards-24230000-grant-to-advance-research-on-SYNGAP1-Related-Disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/SRF-awards-24230000-grant-to-advance-research-on-SYNGAP1-Related-Disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e9e1b2c-0be3-472a-9016-f16541e7a50a Wed, 04 Dec 2024 09:03:31 -0500 SRF awards $230,000 grant to advance research on SYNGAP1-Related Disorders
童年接触含铅汽油与精神疾病和性格改变有关《儿童心理学和精神病学杂志》上发表的新研究表明，由于汽油中使用铅，大多数工业化国家的儿童铅暴露在 1960 年至 1990 年间达到顶峰，对心理健康产生了负面影响，并可能导致许多精神疾病和精神疾病病例。改变了性格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childhood-exposure-to-leaded-gasoline-linked-to-mental-illness-and-personality-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childhood-exposure-to-leaded-gasoline-linked-to-mental-illness-and-personality-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ff1586c-a92a-464e-bbaf-4da435fef1b6 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 08:14:07 -0500 Childhood exposure to leaded gasoline linked to mental illness and personality changes
